abstract: Garish funeral for Mafia don Vittorio Casamonica in Rome causes outrage in Italy, prompting investigation by prime minister and calls for mayor’s resignation; extravagant ceremony with horse-drawn hearse, brass band and rose petal-dropping helicopter, is seen as affront to authorities in corruption-plagued city.
lead_paragraph: Italy reacted with outrage on Friday to a lavish funeral held for the head of a notorious Rome crime family.

headline.main: Italy: Lavish Funeral for a Mafia Don
headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Lavish Funeral for a Mafia Don

snippet: Italy reacted with outrage on Friday to a lavish funeral held for the head of a notorious Rome crime family.
